# .NET Framework

> .NET Framework documentation for Windows-only applications. Covers WPF, Windows Forms, WCF, ADO.NET, and ASP.NET. Note: For new development, use modern .NET (.NET 8+) instead. This documentation supports maintaining legacy applications.

*Topics available: 5393*

- [64-bit Applications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/64-bit-apps.md): Get information about configuring applications on a Windows 64-bit OS, as either a native 64-bit application or under WOW64 (Windows 32-bit on Windows 64-bit).
- [Code analyzers for .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/code-analyzers.md): Learn how to use the analyzers in the .NET Framework Analyzers package to find and address issues in your code.
- [Developing Windows-based client applications with the .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/develop-client-apps.md): Develop Windows-based applications with .NET. You can use Universal Windows Platform (UWP), Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF), or Windows Forms.
- [Developing Web Applications with ASP.NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/develop-web-apps-with-aspnet.md): Develop web apps with ASP.NET Core, which is a redesign of ASP.NET 4.x that's cross-platform, leaner, more modular, and unified to build a web UI and web APIs.
- [.NET Framework Development Guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/development-guide.md): Explore the .NET development guide, which explains how to create, configure, debug, secure, and deploy your .NET apps.

## Subtopics

- [Additional class libraries and APIs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/additional-apis/llms.txt): 76 topics, 156 in tree; Additional class libraries and APIs documentation and reference.

- [Configuring Apps by using Configuration Files](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/llms.txt): 11 topics, 521 in tree; Configuring Apps by using Configuration Files documentation and reference.
- [Data and modeling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/llms.txt): 1 topics, 624 in tree; Data and modeling documentation and reference.

- [Deploying the .NET Framework and Applications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/deployment/llms.txt): 16 topics; Deploying the .NET Framework and Applications documentation and reference.

- [Network Programming Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/network-programming/llms.txt): 40 topics; Network Programming Docs documentation and reference.

- [Release Notes Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/llms.txt): 1 topics, 26 in tree; Release Notes Docs documentation and reference.

- [Developing Windows Service Applications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/windows-services/llms.txt): 16 topics; Developing Windows Service Applications documentation and reference.
